001package reciprocal.polynomial;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.hash;
005import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
006import static org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate.noNullElements;
007
008import java.util.List;
009import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
010import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
011
012/**
013 * Base class for polynomials
014 *
015 * @param <C> coefficient
016 * @param <P> polynomial
017 * @since 0.0.1
018 */
019public abstract class AbstractPolynomial<C extends Number, P extends AbstractPolynomial<C, P>> {
020    private final @NotNull List<@NotNull C> coefficients;
021
022    /**
023     * Constructor
024     *
025     * @param coefficients coefficients
026     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code coefficients == null}
027     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code coefficient == null} for one coefficient in coefficients
028     * @since 0.0.1
029     */
030    protected AbstractPolynomial(final @NotNull List<@NotNull C> coefficients) {
031        requireNonNull(coefficients, "coefficients");
032        noNullElements(coefficients, "all coefficients expected not to be null but coefficients = %s", coefficients);
033        this.coefficients = List.copyOf(coefficients);
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * Degree
038     *
039     * @return degree
040     * @since 0.0.1
041     */
042    public final int getDegree() {
043        return coefficients.size();
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * Indicates if {@code this} is zero
048     *
049     * @return {@link Boolean}
050     * @since 0.0.1
051     */
052    public abstract boolean isZero();
053
054    /**
055     * Indicates if {@code this} is constant
056     *
057     * @return {@link Boolean}
058     * @since 0.0.1
059     */
060    public final boolean isConstant() {
061        return getDegree() == 0;
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Indicates if {@code this} is linear
066     *
067     * @return {@link Boolean}
068     * @since 0.0.1
069     */
070    public final boolean isLinear() {
071        return getDegree() == 1;
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Indicates if {@code this} is quadratic
076     *
077     * @return {@link Boolean}
078     * @since 0.0.1
079     */
080    public final boolean isQuadratic() {
081        return getDegree() == 2;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Indicates if {@code this} is cubic
086     *
087     * @return {@link Boolean}
088     * @since 0.0.1
089     */
090    public final boolean isCubic() {
091        return getDegree() == 3;
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Indicates if {@code this} is quartic
096     *
097     * @return {@link Boolean}
098     * @since 0.0.1
099     */
100    public final boolean isQuartic() {
101        return getDegree() == 4;
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Derivative
106     *
107     * @return derivative
108     * @since 0.0.1
109     */
110    public abstract @NotNull List<@NotNull C> getDerivative();
111
112    /**
113     * Returns the coefficient of a given index
114     *
115     * @param index index
116     * @return coefficient
117     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code index < 0}
118     * @since 0.0.1
119     */
120    public final @NotNull C get(final int index) {
121        checkArgument(index > -1, "expected index > -1 but index = %s", index);
122        return coefficients.get(index);
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Coefficients
127     *
128     * @return coefficients
129     * @since 0.0.1
130     */
131    public final @NotNull List<@NotNull C> getCoefficients() {
132        return List.copyOf(coefficients);
133    }
134
135    @Override
136    public final int hashCode() {
137        return hash(coefficients);
138    }
139
140    @Override
141    public final boolean equals(final @Nullable Object obj) {
142        if (this == obj) {
143            return true;
144        }
145        if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
146            return false;
147        }
148        final var that = (AbstractPolynomial<?, ?>) obj;
149        return coefficients.equals(that.getCoefficients());
150    }
151
152    @Override
153    public final @NotNull String toString() {
154        return getClass().getSimpleName() + "{coefficients=" + coefficients + "}";
155    }
156}
